content_en:
liveSense has many built-in sample applications to demonstrate the capabilities of this OSGi-based framework and how easy it is to use it.

Remark: if you use any third-party web container/server (for example Apache Tomcat) instead of the built-in, we recommend to deploy livesense as ROOT web application (rename the ‘org.liveSense.launchpad-xxx.war’ file to ‘ROOT.war’).
